name: Boris Gardiner
description: '''Boris Gardiner''' (born 13 January 1943) is a Jamaican singer, songwriter and bass guitarist. He was a member of several groups during the 1960s before recording as a solo artist and having hit singles with "[[Elizabethan Serenade|Elizabethan Reggae]]" (in 1970), "[[I Wanna Wake Up with You]]" and "You're Everything to Me" (both 1986). One of his most notable credits is bass on the influential reggae song "[[Real Rock]]".
